entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Churchill Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:03 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Churchill Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending this evening then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
